org.joty.common

Class ConfigFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.joty.common.ConfigFile

  • public class ConfigFile
extends java.lang.Object
    Hosts the content of a configuration file within an internal map of String objects.

    Its constructor loads the content from the file, the name of which is received as parameter, and the configTermValue method makes the access to each term available.

    Its member m_fileContent is keep public for the use on the serve side where its value must be returned to the client just as it is.
